title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
resume: When Adam, Prince of the planet Eternia, raises his magic sword he transforms into He-Man (the most powerful man in the universe).  With his allies and friends, he battles the evil Skeletor and his minions to protect the secrets of Castle Greyskull.
